name: The Wardcliff Coil
flavor_text: Ingenuity. Desperation. A haphazard prototype of terrible power. Such were the factors at play in the Wardcliff Incident.

frame.name: Mad Scientist
frame.description: This weapon fires a volley of rockets.

perks.description:
This weapon is optimized for an especially explosive payload.
  •  Greatly increases blast radius
  •  Slightly decreases handling speed
  •  Slightly decreases projectile speed
perks.name: Volatile Launch

perks.description:
This weapon has a greatly increased magazine size, but reloads much slower.
  •  Greatly increases magazine size
  •  Greatly decreases reload speed
perks.name: Extended Mag

perks.description: This weapon automatically reloads on ammo pickup.
perks.name: Mechanized Autoloader

perks.description:
This weapon has a versatile dual-purpose stock.
  •  Slightly increases stability
  •  Slightly increases handling speed
perks.name: Composite Stock
